text: Phffft! is a 1954 American romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Mark Robson. The movie is based on the play by George Axelrod. Actors include Judy Holliday, Jack Lemmon, Jack Carson, Kim Novak, Donald Curtis, Luella Gear, and Donald Randolph. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson Category:Movies about divorce
title: Phffft!
